content.description: The writer wants to use a neutral tone to describe the goals of the Chicano movement in sentence 1 (reproduced below).
content.question: In the 1960s, the Chicano movement sought to create an uproar over the experiences of Mexican American people in the United States.Which of the following versions of the underlined text best accomplishes this goal?

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Demonstrate an understanding of an audience's beliefs, values, or needs.
